title: Strategy Session
subtitle: Executive Consultation & Roadmap Planning
description: Strategic security guidance covering program assessment, AI/ML security roadmaps, or executive-level threat landscape briefings. Ideal for CISOs, security leaders, and engineering managers needing clarity on security posture or Agentic AI risks.
highlights: Security program assessment & maturity evaluation
AI/ML security strategy & roadmap planning
Executive threat briefing on Agentic AI risks
Vendor & tool selection guidance
Actionable recommendations delivered within 24 hours

title: Product Security Advisory
subtitle: Security Architecture & Supply Chain Strategy
description: Deep-dive consulting on building or maturing your product security program. Covers threat modeling, secure architecture review, software supply chain risk management, SBOM strategies, and establishing security governance across product teams.
highlights: Product security program design & maturity assessment
Threat modeling frameworks (STRIDE, PASTA, Attack Trees)
Software supply chain risk & SBOM strategy
Secure architecture review methodology
Actionable roadmap delivered within 24 hours

title: SAST Implementation
subtitle: Static Analysis Tool Setup & Pipeline Integration
description: Hands-on consulting to set up, configure, and integrate open-source SAST tools including Semgrep, SonarQube, CodeQL, Bandit, and SpotBugs into your environment. Includes CI/CD pipeline integration, custom rule creation, and false positive reduction strategies.
highlights: Tool selection guidance: Semgrep, SonarQube, CodeQL, Bandit, SpotBugs
Language-specific SAST: Bandit (Python), Brakeman (Ruby), ESLint Security
CI/CD pipeline integration (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab)
Custom rule creation & policy configuration
False positive reduction & vulnerability triage strategies

title: SCA Implementation
subtitle: Dependency Analysis & Composition Governance
description: Expert consulting on deploying open-source SCA tools like OWASP Dependency-Check, Grype, Trivy, and OSV Scanner into your workflow. Covers vulnerable dependency identification, automated updates, license compliance, SBOM generation, and vulnerability remediation workflows.
highlights: SCA tool comparison: OWASP Dependency-Check, Grype, Trivy, OSV Scanner
Language-specific SCA: Safety (Python), Retire.js, Bundler-Audit (Ruby)
CI/CD integration for automated dependency scanning
SBOM generation (CycloneDX, SPDX) and consumption
Vulnerability remediation workflows & license compliance

title: DAST Implementation
subtitle: Dynamic Testing & Runtime Security Analysis
description: Consulting engagement to deploy and configure open-source DAST tools including OWASP ZAP, Nikto, and Wapiti in your environment. Covers authenticated scan configuration, API security testing, CI/CD integration, and runtime vulnerability validation workflows.
highlights: DAST tool setup: OWASP ZAP, Nikto, Wapiti, Nuclei
Web vulnerability scanning: w3af, Arachni, HTTPX for reconnaissance
Authenticated scanning configuration & session management
API security testing (REST, GraphQL, gRPC) with ZAP & custom scripts
CI/CD integration for automated DAST scans & regression testing

title: SBOM & Supply Chain Advisory
subtitle: Software Bill of Materials & Provenance Strategy
description: Consulting on SBOM generation, management, and supply chain security tooling. Covers Syft, Grype, Cosign, SLSA provenance, and in-toto attestations. Includes VEX implementation, Dependency-Track setup, and integrating SBOM workflows into CI/CD.
highlights: SBOM generation with Syft, CycloneDX, SPDX formats
Vulnerability scanning with Grype and SBOM consumption
Supply chain provenance: Cosign, SLSA, in-toto attestations
VEX (Vulnerability Exploitability eXchange) implementation
Dependency-Track setup for continuous SBOM monitoring

title: DevSecOps Pipeline Consulting
subtitle: CI/CD Security, IaC Scanning & Container Hardening
description: Expert consulting to secure your CI/CD pipelines and container infrastructure using Trivy, Hadolint, Checkov, TFSec, and Kics. Covers pipeline hardening, security gate implementation, Docker scanning, and policy-as-code enforcement.
highlights: Container security: Trivy, Grype, Docker Bench for Security
IaC scanning: Checkov, TFSec, Kics for Terraform/CloudFormation/ARM
CI/CD pipeline security: GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab hardening
Docker image scanning & vulnerability management workflows
Security gate implementation & policy-as-code with OPA

title: OWASP Tools Advisory
subtitle: OWASP Flagship Tools Implementation & Best Practices
description: Consulting on implementing OWASP flagship tools including ZAP, Dependency-Check, ASVS, SAMM, and Threat Dragon into your security program. Covers OWASP Top 10 detection workflows, security assessments, and maturity model alignment.
highlights: OWASP ZAP: Automated scanning & manual penetration testing
OWASP Dependency-Check: SCA integration & reporting
OWASP ASVS: Application Security Verification Standard implementation
OWASP SAMM: Software Assurance Maturity Model assessment
OWASP Threat Dragon: Threat modeling and attack surface analysis

title: AI/ML Security Consulting
subtitle: RAG Security, Fine-tuning & MLSecOps Advisory
description: Expert consulting on building production-ready, secure AI systems. Covers RAG architecture security, LLM fine-tuning best practices, MLSecOps pipeline design, prompt injection defense, and data leakage prevention with LangChain, HuggingFace, Ollama, and open-source ML tooling.
highlights: RAG architecture security: vector databases, embeddings, retrieval hardening
LLM fine-tuning best practices: LoRA/QLoRA with HuggingFace PEFT
Local model deployment: Ollama and vLLM for secure production inference
MLSecOps: model versioning, artifact security, training pipeline hardening
Prompt injection defense & data leakage prevention strategies

title: Secure Vibecoding Advisory
subtitle: AI-Assisted Development with Security by Default
description: Consulting on implementing 'Vibecoding' â€” AI-assisted development with security built-in from the start. Covers setting up Claude Code, Cline, Cursor, and Gemini CLI for secure code generation, implementing pre-defined security rules, and automated agentic SAST/SCA scans.
highlights: Vibecoding tools: Claude Code, Cline, Cursor, Aider, Gemini CLI
Secure coding by default: OWASP-aligned security rules in AI prompts
Agentic SAST & SCA: Automated security audits of AI-generated code
Security & quality rules: Pre-commit hooks, custom linting, policy enforcement
Implementation plan for secure AI-assisted development workflows

title: Enterprise AppSec Engagement
subtitle: DevSecOps Transformation & Program Building
description: A comprehensive multi-day consulting engagement covering DevSecOps transformation, application security program building, product security governance, and software supply chain defense. Tailored for engineering and security teams modernizing their secure development practices.
highlights: DevSecOps maturity assessment & transformation roadmap
Application security program design (SAST, DAST, SCA)
Product security governance & release management
Software supply chain security & SBOM implementation
Custom scope aligned to your tech stack & business goals

title: AI Security Engagement
subtitle: Enterprise AI/ML Security Program
description: A multi-day consulting engagement covering the Secure-ML Framework and LLM Application Security. Tailored for organizations building or integrating AI/ML systems. Covers threat modeling for LLMs, secure RAG architectures, red-teaming AI systems, and building an internal AI security governance framework.
highlights: Secure-ML Framework: end-to-end ML pipeline security
LLM AppSec: OWASP Top 10 for LLMs in practice
Red-teaming AI systems with automated tooling
Secure RAG architecture design & implementation
Custom scope aligned to your tech stack & business goals
